title: Price Elasticity of Demand for Good X

content.question: If the absolute value of the price elasticity of demand for Good <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> is <math alttext="0.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>0.5</mtext></math>, then a <math alttext="10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn></math> percent decrease in the price of Good <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> will result in which of the following?

choices.label: A <math alttext="5%" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mo>%</mo></math> decrease in the quantity demanded of Good <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>

A <math alttext="5%" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mo>%</mo></math> increase in the quantity demanded of Good <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>

A <math alttext="5%" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mo>%</mo></math> increase in revenues from the sale of Good <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>

A <math alttext="10%" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn><mo>%</mo></math> decrease in revenues from the sale of Good <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>

A <math alttext="10%" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10</mn><mo>%</mo></math> increase in revenues from the sale of Good <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>

content.answer: A <math alttext="5%" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mo>%</mo></math> increase in the quantity demanded of Good <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
